name: Jaroslaw R. Rossignac
content: Jarek Rossignac : homepage at Georgia Tech Professor Jarek Rossignac School of Interactive Computing College of Computing, Georgia Tech Email: jarek@cc.gatech.edu TSRB-232 (Tech Square), parking Bio, honors, papers (citation), patents, students, classes (feedback), applets PROJECTS (sponsor): Steady motions and morphs (NSF), Bending and offsetting with local volume control (NSF), Heart surgery planning (NIH, CHoA), Choreography design and beautification (INRIA), Compact representations for triangle meshes (LLNL), Stroke graph inbetweening (Disney), Mesh compression (Adobe), Animation compression (Zynga), Logic optimization VIDEOS: Design Review with a Tangible Camera Designing shapes using both hands in Twister Bending 3D shapes with a ribbon in Bender GPU rendering of CSG with Blister Smoothing 3D motions with ScrewBender Splashing water with FlowFixer Bubbles with volume control Surgical plans with Surgem Morphing with B-map Inbetweening strokes with Tweener Inbetweening poses with SAM search this site or the Web
